seo.title: Quiz Plugin
seo.description: Create engaging quizzes on your WordPress site and reward users with discount coupons based on their performance. The Codevery Quiz plugin offers customizable quizzes with unlimited questions and easy integration into any post or page. Capture emails for coupon distribution and generate certificates for successful quiz completions.
seo.keywords: WordPress quiz plugin, customizable quizzes, discount coupons, engagement, email capture, certificate generation, interactive quizzes, coupon rewards, user engagement, website customization, sales boost, reward system, point threshold, CSV export, promotional codes.

banner.title: Create your quiz easily
banner.subTitle: Codevery Quiz is a plugin that can be downloaded and used on your website for FREE

items.title: Increase Engagement
items.description: Customers can earn a coupon with a promo code for a discount in an interactive way after successfully completing the quiz

items.title: Quick and Easy to Create
items.description: You can create and customize a quiz on a single page and then insert the shortcode into any post or page and you're good to go

items.title: Customizable
items.description: Questions with text or image answer type, fully customizable coupon and you can add anything you want to the results page (success and failure)

items.title: Capture Emails
items.description: There is a form to send coupons to customers to collect email addresses, these emails can then be exported to a CSV file.

items.title: Certificate Generation
items.description: Ability to generate certificates with discounts for customers who successfully complete the quiz

items.title: Configuration
items.description: After activating the plugin, you can configure some basic settings, such as the number of questions in the quiz, scoring methods, and color settings to match your website design

items.title: Creating a Quiz
items.description: You can add questions and arrange them in a specific order, set answer options, indicate correct answers, assign scoring values, and add images

items.title: Quiz Display
items.description: Once you have created a quiz, the plugin will provide a shortcode that can be inserted into any post or page. This shortcode will create a quiz interface on the front end of your website

items.title: User Interaction
items.description: Visitors to your site will be able to take the quiz by selecting the answers to the questions presented. The plugin displays correct and incorrect answers and provides explanations for the correct answers

items.title: Certificate generation
items.description: After successful completion of the test, a certificate with discounts for customers is generated. In the certificate template, you can customize colors and data
